```{r, include=F}
#Attach Data
dataNMDS <- read.csv("NMDS_Dataset.csv", h = T)
attach(dataNMDS)
str(dataNMDS)

#Install Packages
install.packages("vegan")
library("vegan")

```

#Subsetting Dataset for ordination and descriptive/environmental data
```{r, include = F}
#data for ordination
data_1 <- dataNMDS[,3:13]

#data for description
data_2 <- dataNMDS[,1:2]
```

#Running NMDS 
```{r, include = F}
#In two dimensions
NMDS1 <- metaMDS(data_1, auto=FALSE, k = 2)

```

#Data Visulation
```{r, include = F}

co = c("Red","Blue", "Green", "Orange", "Black")
plot(NMDS1$points, col=co[data_2$Lake], cex=1,2, main="Water Quality Composition", xlab = "axis 1", ylab = "axis 2")

 ```
